channel.title: Comments on: Why Are iPad Apps So Much Better Than Android Apps

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: So far, I'm loving the iPad mini. I have an original Kindle Fire that has been rooted and loaded with Jelly Bean, but I never use it. Even my iPad 2 is now just a secondary monitor for keeping up on Twitter and Facebook throughout the day.
item.content:encoded: So far, I’m loving the iPad mini. I have an original Kindle Fire that has been rooted and loaded with Jelly Bean, but I never use it. Even my iPad 2 is now just a secondary monitor for keeping up on Twitter and Facebook throughout the day.
